pages.text: $(l)Effect:$() Attackers have a chance of being cursed. Chance high with higher Accursed level. Curse amplifier stacks.$(br)$(l)Enchants:$() $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/totem_of_amethyst)Totem of Amethyst$()$(br)$(l)Max Level:$() 3$(br)$(l)Active/Passive:$() Passive, drains durability on application$(br)$(l)Tier:$() High(br)$(l)Incompatibilities:$() Other passive totem augments.
